briefTitle: Stress Management in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: How Can Health Care Help Female Breastcancer Patients Reduce Their Stress Symptoms? A Randomized Intervention Study With Stepped-care
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* over the age of 18
* a recent diagnosis of breast cancer
* scheduled for adjuvant treatment in Falun, Gävle or Uppsala (Sweden)

Exclusion Criteria:

* ongoing psychiatric condition
* language deficiencies in Swedish
